means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 莱瑟职业名称，皮革制作者或皮货销售者，来源于中世纪英语及古英语，含义是“皮革”(leather)

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"皮，皮肤"之意。
means: skin ： 最常用词，指人的皮肤或动物的皮，也可指水果、植物和种子等的外皮。
leather ： 通常指经过加工的熟皮，可用于制作各种皮革制品。
fur ： 现多指猫、兔等动物软毛皮，也指其它动物的毛皮。
hide ： 多指大型动物的厚皮，也指没有鞣的牛、马等皮革。
peel ： 指剩下的或可以剥去的果皮或蔬菜皮。

sentence.Network_en: Leather jeans that are too big will make you look larger.
sentence.Network_cn: 过于肥大的皮裤会让你看起来块头更大。

sentence.Network_en: He drummed his fingers on the leather top of his desk.
sentence.Network_cn: 他用手指连续敲击他的皮革桌面。

sentence.Network_en: When selecting boots, fine, quality leather will be a wise investment.
sentence.Network_cn: 在挑选长筒靴的时候，购买上等的好皮靴将是明智的选择。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English lether, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch leer and German Leder, from an Indo-European root shared by Irish leathar and Welsh lledr

entry.def: Leather is treated animal skin which is used for making shoes, clothes, bags, and furniture.

example.ex: He wore a leather jacket and dark trousers.
example.tran: 他身穿皮夹克和深色裤子。

example.ex: ...an impressive range of upholstered furniture, in a choice of fabrics and leathers.
example.tran: 琳琅满目的覆面家具，有多种布料和皮革可供选择

entry.tran: （尤指骑摩托车者穿的）皮外套，皮衣
entry.def: Leathers are leather clothes such as jackets and trousers, especially those worn by motorcyclists.

example.ex: ...a couple of youths in motorcyclists' black leathers.
example.tran: 两个穿黑色机车皮衣的年轻人

means.word_mean: 1. an animal skin made smooth and flexible by removing the hair and then tanning
